description: Family has 3 children (2 toddlers, 1 infant). One of the child is diagnosed with cancer and is feeding only on this milk. Parent is working part time and taking care of the children. This will help them to lighten their load.

name: S26 Gold Stage 4
description:
Client would require milk powder and diapers support to tide through tonight as his pay is coming in tomorrow. 
He was recently sued by his creditor and his application for Debt Repayment Scheme is in progress. 
He does not have any savings left. This is for a family of 4 with 2 young children.
Thank you.

name: Child dining chair with removable table
description: I have a client with a young child (4 years old) with multiple medical conditions. The family is solely dependent on the husband as the sole breadwinner. They are not able to afford a child dining chair with removable table due to limited family finances. This idea was recommended by the child's dietician at KKH. This will allow the child to slowly transition from tube feeding towards spoon feeding. Thank you!

Due to their chronic financial difficulties, the family need support with their infant’s milk powder (Dulac Stage 2 Milk - 2 tins). Appreciate for delivery to be arranged and covered by donor. name: Milk Powder and Diapers

A low-income family of 6 with 2 young children (1yo and 3yo) requires milk powder and diapers for the children.

- Aptamil 3 milk powder
- Merries/Mamy Poko Pant Diapers size L

Client is unable to work due to medical conditions and is the primary caregiver for her 4 young children. On the interim, family is reliant on limited income of sole breadwinner father. Family lives in public rental housing.

name: Nan Optipro Kid Stage 4 x 2 tins
description:
Low income family needs: Both boys (4 years and 3 years old) have thalassemia. Younger sibling 2 years old has special needs and going for surgery soon. Older boy doesn't eat well so he is supplementing his diet with NAN Optipro Kid Stage 4. The younger boy is lactose-intolerant and is on Mamil Gold Soy Milk. 
Due to additional expenses of younger sibling's surgery and transport cost ferrying from home to hospital, cost of milk powder is a strain on family's finances.

name: Huggies Diapers

Elderly couple would like to request for donation for a NEW king size mattress.

name: Wardrobe

contact.org: THK Family Service Centre @ Bedok North
contact.name: Teddy Fu

name: 4-door Wardrobe
description: This is a single-parent family with a child with special needs and no income. Mother is unable to work as she is the main caregiver to her son with special needs and high medical needs who requires assistance in most of his activities of daily living. Mother also has an elder son who is still schooling. The elder son's current wardrobe is 3-door and is breaking apart, so the family would like to change to a 4-door one to store more things and keep the house organised. Family is receiving Comcare Assistance.

name: 4-door Wardrobe
description: Client is a frail woman who is undergoing divorce. She is the main caregiver to her son with special needs. Despite her employment, which is unstable, client is financially dependent on financial assistance. The family is hoping to receive any available 4-seater wardrobe. Due to family's financial circumstances, client is unable to afford the purchase of a wardrobe on their own. Kindly contact me at 98598768 for delivery address etc. Thank you.

name: 10-door Wardrobe
description:
Client is a single mother with four children in a one-room rental flat. She had brought them up singlehandedly without any support from her ex-husband and is supporting three of her children's ITE education by doing parcel delivery. She is looking for a wardrobe with multiple compartments to allow more storage space. 

For example: 10-door wardrobe

name: Clothes Wardrobe
description: Please WhatsApp Odelia at 8588 3163 during office hours or email to Odelia.Teo@thkmc.org.sg to liaise. Client has a medical condition (Chari Malformation) where she experiences symptoms including pain, migraines and fainting spells, which affected her physical ability to work and had recently left her job. She recently underwent her third surgery in December 2021. Since she left her job, the family has been facing further financial constraints as her husband has been the sole breadwinner supporting the family of 6 children and Client’s elderly mother, who goes for kidney dialysis. Their cupboard has recently broke and they are unable to store their items. Will appreciate a donation of a clothes wardrobe in good condition.

name: Wardrobe
description: Client is a divorcee supporting her 4 school-going children. She is not receiving any maintenance from her ex-husband. For further liaison on delivery address etc, do contact me at 98598768, thank you very much.

name: Standing Fans
description: Client is a single mother with an 18-month old son. She has recently been allocated a rental flat. However, she has no savings to furnish the flat. She has not been able to work as she has no stable housing arrangement, which made it challenging to secure an infant care for her son. The family would benefit from being supported with two standing fans.

name: Washing Machine
description: Family of 3, consisting of client , her 11 year old son and 78 year old mother who is bedridden. Family's washing machine has spoilt and they have been tapping on neighbour's one but it is not a long term solution. Family would benefit from a donated washing machine, thank yoU!

name: Wine Chiller
description: The wine chiller will be used to help provide the optimal temperature for our sourdough starter. With our sourdough starter, we are now able to venture into artisanal bread making in our Knead With Love bakery at THK Pan-Disability Centre.

name: Ceiling Fan
description: Family of 3 with one school-going children staying in a 1-room public rental flat and lacking living space due to the space constraints. They were unable to get a 2-room public rental flat due to being unable to afford the higher rental fees. As a result, they would like to request for a ceiling fan to save space within the house due to the cluttering and improve the air ventilation within the house.

name: Washing Machine

contact.org: Fei Yue Family Service Centre @ Champions Way
contact.name: Timothy Tan

name: Electric Water Heater - With Installation
description:
Family of 3. 

Father has been working all these while since last year, low income (1.2k). Mother has been working previously as well, but returned to India with the children in 2019, and was stuck there due to covid-19. The mother and child just returned from India to SG mid last year, when the travel lanes started. 

However unfortunately, the father was diagnosed with spinal conditions, that are degenerative in nature in late 2021. Hence, he is also not able to return to his previous job as a admin staff due to difficulty to type.  He has been hospitalised and is currently still undergoing therapy for rehabilitation. Hospital mentioned that the whole rehab period takes 6 months, and he will need to be retrained to take on new job meanwhile due to the new disability present. Mother has to take care of him in the meantime and will not be able to work. The son is in his teens.

Family is currently on Comcare financial assistance.

contact.org: AMKFSC Community Services Ltd - Ang Mo Kio
contact.name: Quek Liu Ting

name: 3 Wall Fans (Includes installation)
description:
Family lives in public rental flat and have 1 pri school child and a 8-month-old baby. 
The house is crowded and stuffy. 
Father is the sole breadwinner doing food deliveries and mother is a home maker. 
Client is requesting for 3 wall fans to circulate the air at home.
Thank you.

name: Shower Water Heater
description:
Our client is experiencing homelessness and was residing at a S3P shelter for the past 6-7 months. 
He has received his keys for his rental flat in Dec 2021. 
However, due to the financial situation (i.e. getting a new full-time job with the new housing stability), he would require support for basic household items to support his family's shift into the new rental flat.
Thank you.

name: Fridge
description: An elderly male who is known to Thye Hua Kwan Moral Charities (THKMC) stays alone & has no family support. He requested for a new fridge (enough for one person to use) as his current one is spoilt. Please kindly take note that the fees for the delivery needs to be borne by donor. Pls kindly contact May at 83686286 if you are keen to help this elderly. We appreciate if the donor can arrange for delivery & installation of the washing machine directly to the elderly's home at Blk 79 Indus Road #13-439 S(161079). For more information on THKMC, pls visit: https://www.thkmc.org.sg

name: Mountain Bike with Front basket
description: Retiree old bicycle was damaged. Seeks a mountain bike with front basket for marketing runs and exercise.

name: Wheelchair with cloth material seat and movable hand rest
description: Client is an elderly and lives alone. She has weak legs and is dependent on walking stick to move around at home. Client used to have a wheelchair but the wheelchair is now malfunctioned. Thus, she has difficulties going to the shop or seeking help by herself.

name: Lightweight Pushchair for elderly
description: A senior with mobility issue requires a pushchair for her family to escort her around. The family has financial difficulties and is unable to purchase the item. We are seeking donation for the mentioned item to assist the senior in getting around in the community.
specifications: Open dimensions (W x H x L): 60 x 89 x 100 cm

name: Motorised Wheelchair
description:
Family consisted of an elderly couple with no children. Husband was a stroke patient and has been depending on his motorized wheelchair to move around the house after losing his mobility. Their current wheelchair has spoilt, and couple do not have any means to repair or purchase a new one. 

Due to financial constraint, would appreciate that delivery fee to be covered by donor.

contact.org: AMKFSC Community Services Ltd - Cheng San
contact.name: Yong Jia Chiu

name: Motorised Wheelchair
description: Family of 3 living in a 2 room rental flat. Client unable to work at the moment as he is undergoing therapy for his medical condition. Wife is main caregiver of him and 7 year old young child. She is currently exploring employment to help supplement family's financial needs. The wheelchair will help to offset some financial costs from the family as it lessens cost of transportation. For further liaison of delivery information, please contact Nurul at 98598767 via whatsapp. Thank you.

name: Motorised Wheelchair
description:
Elderly client and her husband live together, no children, no income. Client is a caregiver to her husband who attends dementia daycare from Mon-Fri. Client usually stays home due to poor mobility and uses wheelchair when she goes out. Husband's PG controller of his motorized wheelchair is damaged and they're unable to afford repairs. 

Please contact Sarah at 97232082, or email sarahseetow@mws.sg

contact.org: MWS Active Ageing Centre - Kebun Baru
contact.name: Sarah Seetow

name: Wheelchair
description: Widowed father with 2 young children needs a size 24 wheelchair. Father has multiple medical condition (heart, high blood pressure, kidney issue etc) and is unable to work. His current wheelchair has broken down and needs extensive repairs.

name: Electric Wheelchair
description: Elderly person with no income recently discharged from hospital and is unable to walk independently. Hopes to receive a motorised wheelchair in order to assist him in ADL such as going out to buy groceries etc.

name: Transport Needs
description:
Client resides in a 2-room rental unit with her husband and 7 children. Her husband does food delivery and is the sole breadwinner of the family as client is currently pregnant. 
The family experiences difficulties in making ends meet, amidst having multiple health and chronic issues as well. Husband's medical condition is acting up and will be unable to work for a few days.
Thank you.

name: Daily Meals [URGENT]
description: The family have just tested positive for COVID (both parents). There are 3 adults and 2 children in the house and they need halal certified daily meals. Please contact us at dik@childrensociety.org.sg or +65 94367401 for more details. We greatly appreciate your kind support!

name: Cleaning Products
description: Client is a 26 y/o single mother with two children. Due to childhood abandonment issues and a verbally abusive relationship with her adopted mother, client has developed a strong attachment to cats as they make her feel safe. This has resulted in client accumulating up to 40 cats. However, she is currently trying to sterilise all her cats and give most of them away as she is financially and physically unable to clean/care for all of them. It has been a challenge for client to afford cleaning products to clean the house and the cats' droppings have caused the house to have a strong odour. As such, she would greatly benefit from the donation of the following cleaning products: Dettol Antiseptic Germicide Liquid, Bleach, Jif Lemon Cream Surface Cleaner, Lifebuoy Botanitech™ Multi-purpose Disinfectant Spray, mop and broom and scrub

contact.org: AMKFSC Community Services Ltd - Cheng San
contact.name: Charmaine Lim

description:
Mdm Shabrina is married with 4 young children, aged 6 years old, 3 years old, 2 years old and 10 months old. Husband is the main breadwinner supporting 6 of them. Client just started a new part-time job after 6 years of taking care of her children.

Client is requesting for this as her 10-month-old baby's infant care is asking her baby to take the test everyday using either this 2 kits. Client cant afford to purchase that

name: Groceries
description:
Client is a father of two, and is undergoing a divorce, and also facing more than one medical procedures within this month. As he is a self-employed taxi driver, during his recovery period, he would not be able to earn any income, and would run into difficulties meeting his basic needs, and taking care of his children. As such, client would benefit from fresh rations such as fresh meat and whole foods which are nutritious for his recovery and for his children. 
Grocery list: 
Fresh Meat -3kg (chicken, fish), 
Rice - 10kg, 
Condiments(salt, pepper, soy sauce), Cooking oil - 1 litre, 
Bread and spread (butter and jam), 
Diapers (Drypers XL & XXL)
Milk (ISOMIL stage 3 & FRISOGOLD stage 4), Soap & Shampoo Toothpaste Toilet rolls.

name: CDC Voucher
description: Requesting for multiple donation of CDC vouchers for 4 families in need. Clients are rental flat, Blue CHAS and unemployed, some have young children as well. Donors, please email direct to travislee@kkcs.org.sg.

name: Frisolac Gold AR milk formular
description: The baby is in need of 12 tins of Frisolac Gold AR milk formular now. These are for infants who require milk  formula containing Carob Bean Gum and this type is recommended by specialist. We welcome whatever quantities that the donor wishes to donate and there is no obligation on the minimum items donated. Please contact us at dik@childrensociety.org.sg for delivery details. Thank you for your kind and generous support!

name: Cat foods and necessities
description:
Family of six with 4 children are caring for 12 cats. They are facing financial difficulties this month due to a pay cut and would need help affording cat food and necessities while we assist them in rehoming their cats. Here are needed items: 
1. Wet food (Aastas Cat Soupy Stew Tuna)
2. Dry food (NicePets Premium Pro Meal)
3. Litter sand (Aatas Cat Kuick Klump)
4. Milk for kittens

name: Groceries Needs
description:
Family has 7 pax in total, with 5 children. 
Client is temporarily unfit for work while her husband was asked to resign a month back due to his poor health condition. 
The family faces chronic financial difficulties due to debts, and coupled with no income now, they are not able to make ends meet. 
Request for NTUC vouchers to cover the family's basic necessities and fresh groceries.
Thank you.
